name: 2023 9th International Conference on e-Society, e-Learning and e-Technologies
content: Publication: The accepted paper will be included into ICSLT 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-0041-5), archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
